name: sync-yt
description: YouTube Music Downloader with Parallel Processing and Car Multimedia Optimization

scripts.check: ts-node -e "console.log('Checking dependencies...'); try { require('child_process').execSync('yt-dlp --version && ffmpeg -version', {stdio: 'inherit'}); console.log('All dependencies installed!'); } catch(e) { console.error('Missing dependencies. Please install yt-dlp and ffmpeg.'); process.exit(1); }"
